actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill for the relief of Deborah Lynn Miller.

summary.text: Directs the Director of the Office of Personnel Management to place the name of a specified individual on the register of Chicago region eligibles for the position of Federal Aviation Administration air traffic controller.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Deborah Lynn Miller.
